title: Pixel 5 stuck on reboot after try to restart on google playstore update
content: The day before my pixel 5 had already kept restarting on its own until finally stuck in recovery mode. I had made factory reset and it turn back normal. The next day I had restore everything back from backup and works normally. Just now google playstore update prompt appear and required restart so I continued restart. Now, The phone stuck on reboot with google logo and endless loading only appeared. How can I fix this situation?
